document.docAuthor: Tekin, Kagan, Krystyn, Leopold, Okuyucu, Cengiz, Bedi, Yavuz & Sayit, Kaan
document.masterDocTitle: Late Triassic to Early Jurassic radiolarian, conodont and ammonite assemblages from the Tavuscayiri block, Mersin Mélange, southern Turkey: Time constraints for the T / J boundary and sedimentary evolution of the southern margin of the northern Neotethys

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Late Triassic to Early Jurassic radiolarian, conodont and ammonite assemblages from the Tavuscayiri block, Mersin Mélange, southern Turkey: Time constraints for the T / J boundary and sedimentary evolution of the southern margin of the northern Neotethys

subSubSection.paragraph: OCCURRENCE. — Lower Jurassic, middle Hettangian-middleToarcian of Gümüslü village, Lycien Nappes, Burdur , Antalya Nappes, NE of Antalya city and Mersin Mélange, NW of Mersin city, southern Turkey ; Queen Charlotte Islands, British Columbia , Canada ; Baja California Sur , Mexico ; Austria ; Slovenia ; Oman ; Busuanga Island, Philippines ; Japan .
